phrase: Life is tough, my darling, but so are you.
author: Stepanie Bennett Henry

phrase: To live a creative life, we must lose our fear of being wrong
author: Joseph Chilton Pearce

phrase: Doubts kills more dreams than failure ever will
author: Karim Seddiki

phrase: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop
author: Confusius

phrase: If you dont go after what you want, you'll never have it. If you don't ask, the answer is always no. If you don't sleep forward, you're always in the same place.
author: Nora Roberts
